https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/mHWAymjuy7wNyjSHZmTleVWU1HI.jpg In a world ravaged by a rabies virus that turns people into hungry cannibals, Alice a pregnant survivor, along with two other men, struggles to reach an island unaffected by the plague. Meanwhile a dangerous man is on the trail of a mysterious girl, and Alice soon discovers that zombies are not the only threat. Anger of the Dead
